item.title: Adventures in Go: Writing a TUI, Part 1 - tview
item.description: I’ve been coding in Go quite often for the last new months, and it has certainly become my favorite programming language. So far I’ve made a small music tag editor, a variation of a hangman game, a little music scheduler, and was trying to build a dotfile manager but that didn’t go too far. And in the process I’ve actually learned a lot about making TUIs (Terminual User Interfaces), which prompted me to write this article.
